CustomField.description: Commonly a subject requires a level requirement e.g. HORT 300... so in that case, set to 300 - completion will do a > check. So if 300 & 400 are required, just use 300.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Commonly a subject requires a level requirement e.g. HORT 300... so in that case, set to 300 - completion will do a > check. So if 300 & 400 are required, just use 300.
CustomField.label: Level Requirement
